DIVISION OF EDUCATION
W. K. KELLOGG FOUNDATION
250 CHAMPION STREET
BATTLE CREEK, MICHIGAN
MAURICE F. SEAY
DIRECTOR
April 20, 1959
HONE WO 8-8118
RS
Dr. Harry J. Skornia
Executive Director
Nat*l. Assâ€™n. of Educational Broadcasters
14 Gregory Hall
Urbana, Illinois
Dear Harry:
Thanks for this note with respect to the Washington meeting.
I hope that I will he able to attend when it is held either
in September or October. And I have on my calendar October
27-30 for your Detroit convention. I hope that I can attend,
but at the moment I hesitate to be definite. There are so
many fall meetings, some of which become a "must" in the
light of project developments.
Sincerely and with best wishes,
77U
Maurice F. Seay
